Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Chenotide cQ2 (Natural AMPs, gly-rich, chitin-binding CB-HLP, UCSS1a; 3S=S, plants; BBS)

Literature.Author: Loo S, Tay SV, Kam A, Tang F, Fan JS, Yang D, Tam JP. 2021
Literature.Title: Anti-Fungal Hevein-like Peptides Biosynthesized from Quinoa Cleavable Hololectins

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (73.33%) tohevin-like  Ar-AMPC: 20%; G: 30%. GRAVY: 0.203, mol Wt: 2900.386; mol formula: C119H183N37O36S6; mol ex coeff: 1865.Activity: active against phyto-pathogenic fungi A. alternata (IC50 9 uM), C. lunata(IC50 5 uM), F. oxysporum (IC50 0.3 uM), and R. solani (IC50 3 uM).Chemical modification: C1-C4, C2-C5, and C3-C6.Structure:  determined based on 187 NMR-derived distance restraints. One-turn helix: 24-28; Two beta-strands: C14-S16 and F20-G22.You can rotate, zoom, and view the structureherein the PDB.Antimicrobial robustness: highly stable against heat (95 oC), acid (1M HCl), and proteolytic degradation (pepsin, aminopeptidase I, horse serum, and human serum).
